title: Are we getting a new cinematic soon?
body: I feel like there should be a new cinematic coming pretty soon as we didn't get one for Legends Never Die, and the Star Guardian didn't really count for me. Is it being worked on?

replies.body:
There is also more to come :p ?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lOnOrTUBnaw

Lord I hope it means Evelynn cinematic at best
Or at least a cinematic for the new champion
( I see bubbles in the future https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-waeHSqqKVs4/WeZFsVCEk0I/AAAAAAAAxd0/1T4fWPjSekE5OxptPuo_q1h-2Apxcez-ACLcBGAs/s1600/LOL_CMS_138_Article_01.jpg )

I want another one on the same caliber as New Dawn and Twist of Fate. Those were the best that Riot's produced, and it was great to see random champions fighting each other. I still love all of Riot's experimenting with new styles of animation, but I would love some good old-fashioned cinematics.

Seems Riot was just late on this

I was hoping all 7.19 patch that Evelynn would get a cinematic but alas that is a dying dream
Im guessing the next cinematic will either go to the next new champion or a new batch of skins
. I really hope itâ€™s the former and not the later cause as great as some skinlines are ,cinematics should be focused on new or vgu champions cause they need more of an advertising boost and their cinematics directly relate with the core lore of league.
Maybe as a teaser for the next coming champion?
Personally i'm hoping so. Sorry I don't have the answers you seek.
